wordGroup: acne vulgaris 寻常痤疮；普通粉刺

sentences.en: Many kids suffer from acne and angst.
sentences.cn: 许多孩子深受粉刺和焦虑之苦。

sentences.en: She wore no makeup, and her face was dotted with acne.
sentences.cn: 她没有化妆，脸上长满了粉刺。

sentences.en: She had makeup caked on her face to hide her acne scars.
sentences.cn: 她在脸上化上浓妆以遮住粉刺疤痕。
